Dear Mr. Hall*
Since I am in program development for the southern states,
your letter of August 20th was given to me. I am pleased to know
Wofford will be doing some television production this fall.
As to some help, you mentioned Dan Wozniak, and I think he
is very well suited to offer you assistance. Another tip would be to
write to Dr. Harry Skornia, National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters, lU Gregory Hall, University of Illinois, Urbana, Illinois.
The association has many seminar and workshop reports and other items
that should help you very much. I will send Dr. Skornia a copy of this
letter so he will know that you are going to write. Wofford would be
eligible .for associate membership possibly in the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters when your production center is functioning.
Please let me know if you do not receive as much information
as you would like and I will sit down and write as much as I can think
of that might help you. Thanks very much for writing us and good luck
this fall.
Sincerely,
KDWiera
Kenneth D. Wright
Program Associate
